CELL.name: Prison Cell
CELL.desc: You awake in a dark, musty prison cell. The door to your lockup has been left slightly ajar.

FOYER.name: Hallway
FOYER.desc:
Upon exiting the cell, you find yourself in a long hallway, with openings on the North and South ends of the hall. 
Light can be seen flooding in from the South end.

SDOOR.name: Outside
SDOOR.desc:
You are now outside of the prison. Around you, multiple turrets can be seen, their gray stone forms towering over you. 
Armor clad bodies are strewn around you, their crimson details staining the formerly green field
a disugsting shade of red. You hear sounds of combat to the east, and a path lies north.

NDOOR.name: A Dark Room
NDOOR.desc:
You enter a dark room, with no light coming in aside from the torches of the hall you entered from.
In the darkness, you can make out a humanoid form crouched in the corner.You call out to it, and immediately regret your decision.
As the form turns, you see it was crouched over the eviscerated remains some indiscernable creature.
The voracious beast stands, almost double your size even while hunched over. Its face is covered in odious scarlet, its eyes a milky white.
The monstrosity flashes a toothy grin at you, its disfigured teeth littered with sinewy flesh. You blink, and it's gone.
The last thing you ever feel is the warm, damp breath of the abhorrence down the back of your neck.

BATTLE.name: Battleground
BATTLE.desc:
You follow the sounds of combat and arrive at a battleground. All around you, knights battle with hellish monstrosities.
The creatures appear to be humans turned inside out, their putrid flesh a sickly hue of brown.
 A knight points your way, and you wave towards the combatant. 
You notice too late that he was, in fact, directing an archer. 
The archer fires from his crossbow, and before you can react, the steel bolt pierces your chest. 
The world fades to black as you sink to the ground.

PATH.name: A Dirt Path
PATH.desc:
You find yourself on a dirt path, that diverges to the left and right.
A sign in front of you reads: To the right lies your salvation. To the left, your innermost desires.

LTURN.name: Inferno
LTURN.desc: The sins of man shall not go unpunished. Your avarice has won you the prize of eternal damnation. Hope you like pushing weights!

RTURN.name: Paradiso
RTURN.desc:
Your salvation has come to you. The archangel Michael descends before you, his form covered in eyes (Ezekiel 10:12). 
He smites you with holy flames, the benefactor's warmth covering you, and you ascend to Paradise. 
You are saved.
